text: Indeed , USA - derived PC2 was found to act synergistically with PC4 in reproducing the function of intact USA in the assay system .

text: Surprisingly , however , removal of <extra_id_0> PC4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> from the unfractionated nuclear extract has no detrimental effect on <extra_id_0> OCA-B <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> / <extra_id_0> Oct-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - dependent transcription .

These results lead to a general model for the synergistic function of activation domains in <extra_id_0> Oct-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> OCA-B <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( mediated by the combined action of the multiple USA components ) and , further , suggest a functional redundancy in general coactivators .
